disp-quote.p: “ I was told about PrEP and it was ok, but I told them that condoms were working well for me and I can stick to them for the meantime. But if they were not working well for me, I was going to take PrEP. [The HCW] said it was ok., they were not going to force me to take PrEP, because I am the one who knows best on what I need. I just want to use condoms only. ”–Male, 36, in SDC (RUR24) (D)
